column4: hi guys i installed LAMP on ubuntu server 10110 and then put drupal in /var/www but when i go to the website it wants to download the files instead of showing the site. any ideas?
php is probably not installed, or you have to restart apache
what does it try  download, when you don't specify the page?
it doesnt say the filename it just says type is application/x-trash
if you try to save it it will suggest you a name which should be the filename
had the same thing with wordpress so i figured it was server problem
did you use the install.php installer?
yep went through the install proccess no problem
check out on /var/www if you have nothing else with index.htm name, maybe that's where apache sends you
thanks ill check and let you know
there was an index.html.old file in the directory and that seemed to be the issue, thanks for the suggestion
anytime ^^ Next tme deploy your CMS on a fresh subdir until you're sure it's working, then pull it to www
problem with that is im not technically deploying it just assisting on the one
since your here and helpful do you know how to add json support to a LAMP server?
